(1, 1, 1): (1951-04-05) April 5, 1951 (age 67), Long Island, New York, U.S.
(4, 1, 1): Invention of the iBot Wheelchair, the Segway and founder of FIRST, North Dumpling Island
(5, 1, 1): Hoover Medal (1995), Heinz Award in Technology, the Economy and Employment  (1999), National Medal of Technology and Innovation (2000), Lemelson-MIT Prize (2002), ASME Medal (2007), Lindbergh Award (2011), Global Humanitarian Award (2013)
